channel.title: MySQL won't start anymore?
channel.description:
I tried updating xampp, and I did from 1.7.1 to 1.7.4, but the MySQL service will not start. I then, reinstalled the old version, still no success. Error log: [code]110224 22:47:05 [Note] Plugin 'FEDERATED' is disabled. InnoDB: The InnoDB memory heap is disabled InnoDB: Mutexes and rw_locks use Windows interlocked functions InnoDB: Compressed tables use zlib 1.2.3 110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: Initializing buffer pool, size = 16.0M 110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: Completed initialization of buffer pool 110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: highest supported file format is Barracuda. 110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: 1.1.4 started; log sequence number 1591515 110224 22:47:05 [ERROR] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: unknown option '--skip-locking' 110224 22:47:05 [ERROR] Aborting
110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: Starting shutdown... 110224 22:47:07 InnoDB: Shutdown completed; log sequence number 1591515 110224 22:47:07 [Note] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: Shutdown complete
110224 22:50:20 [Note] Plugin 'FEDERATED' is disabled. InnoDB: The InnoDB memory heap is disabled InnoDB: Mutexes and rw_locks use Windows interlocked functions InnoDB: Compressed tables use zlib 1.2.3 110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: Initializing buffer pool, size = 16.0M 110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: Completed initialization of buffer pool 110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: highest supported file format is Barracuda. 110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: 1.1.4 started; log sequence number 1591515 110224 22:50:20 [ERROR] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: unknown option '--skip-locking' 110224 22:50:20 [ERROR] Aborting
110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: Starting shutdown... 110224 22:50:21 InnoDB: Shutdown completed; log sequence number 1591515 110224 22:50:21 [Note] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: Shutdown complete [/code]./xampp/mysql/data/ I even tried installing a newer version of MySQL, but it won't even start up. Can someone please help. :'(

item.title: MySQL won't start anymore?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I fixed it, but for some reason it’s dcing my server now. It didn’t do this before.

item.title: MySQL won't start anymore?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I tried updating xampp, and I did from 1.7.1 to 1.7.4, but the MySQL service will not start. I then, reinstalled the old version, still no success. Error log: [code]110224 22:47:05 [Note] Plugin ‘FEDERATED’ is disabled.
InnoDB: The InnoDB memory heap is disabled
InnoDB: Mutexes and rw_locks use Windows interlocked functions
InnoDB: Compressed tables use zlib 1.2.3
110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: Initializing buffer pool, size = 16.0M
110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: Completed initialization of buffer pool
110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: highest supported file format is Barracuda.
110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: 1.1.4 started; log sequence number 1591515
110224 22:47:05 [ERROR] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: unknown option ‘–skip-locking’
110224 22:47:05 [ERROR] Aborting

110224 22:47:05 InnoDB: Starting shutdown…
110224 22:47:07 InnoDB: Shutdown completed; log sequence number 1591515
110224 22:47:07 [Note] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: Shutdown complete

110224 22:50:20 [Note] Plugin ‘FEDERATED’ is disabled.
InnoDB: The InnoDB memory heap is disabled
InnoDB: Mutexes and rw_locks use Windows interlocked functions
InnoDB: Compressed tables use zlib 1.2.3
110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: Initializing buffer pool, size = 16.0M
110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: Completed initialization of buffer pool
110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: highest supported file format is Barracuda.
110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: 1.1.4 started; log sequence number 1591515
110224 22:50:20 [ERROR] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: unknown option ‘–skip-locking’
110224 22:50:20 [ERROR] Aborting

110224 22:50:20 InnoDB: Starting shutdown…
110224 22:50:21 InnoDB: Shutdown completed; log sequence number 1591515
110224 22:50:21 [Note] C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysqld: Shutdown complete
[/code]./xampp/mysql/data/
I even tried installing a newer version of MySQL, but it won’t even start up. Can someone please help. :’(

Read full topic
